markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">[Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=51)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 326 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Gozreh](/Deities.aspx?ID=8), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=54), [Lady Nanbyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=179), [Lysianassa](/Deities.aspx?ID=105), [Seafarer's Hope](/Deities.aspx?ID=255)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

**Area** 50 feet long by 50 feet wide

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Water creatures in the area are subjected to the effects of [_slow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=289).
name: Control Water

</row>

<row gap="medium">
 

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Raise or lower water in a large area.
</summary>
summary: Raise or lower water in a large area.
summary_markdown: Raise or lower water in a large area.
text: Control Water Source Core Rulebook pg. 326 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Gozreh, Isis, Lady Nanbyo, Lysianassa, Seafarer's Hope Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 500 feet Area 50 feet long by 50 feet wide --- By imposing your will upon the water, you can raise or lower the level of water in the chosen area by 10 feet. Water creatures in the area are subjected to the effects of slow .
